benchmark_details.name: CogTest
benchmark_details.overview: CogTest is a principled benchmark designed to evaluate Large Reasoning Models' (LRMs) cognitive habits using 16 cognitive habits, each instantiated with 25 diverse tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and understand the cognitive habits exhibited by Large Reasoning Models.

data.annotation: Manual verification for task quality and automated extraction of cognitive habits via LLMs.

methodology.calculation: Cognitive habits are identified through the reasoning Chains of Thought (CoTs) produced by LRM responses to tasks.
methodology.interpretation: LRMs showing a higher frequency of certain cognitive habits indicate stronger reasoning capabilities.
methodology.validation: Compared performance across 16 models and their cognitive habit profiles.
